questions.question: What is the prominent text displayed at the very top of the rectangular food label, signifying the nutritional information presented?

What is the dominant color scheme observed across the nutritional information panel, primarily involving the text and background?
Focusing on the textual elements, what is the font style predominantly used for presenting the nutritional facts?
Observing the structure of the nutrition facts, what is the format used to categorize and present the various nutritional components?
What is the color of the numerical values indicating the amounts of each nutritional component, such as calories and total fat?
Based on visual observation, what is the texture of the surface of the depicted food label?
Regarding the information presented, what specific unit is used to measure the amount of calories in a single serving?
Considering the label's visual design, what type of lines, if any, are employed to separate the various nutritional components?
What is the style of the bordering lines, if present, that surround sections of the nutrition fact table?
What is the primary visual medium used to convey the nutritional information, considering the overall composition of the image?
What is the color of the percentage values that show the relative contribution of each nutrient to the daily recommended intake?

What is the overall visual impression of the level of detail presented in the nutritional information panel?
Considering the arrangement of the nutritional information, is the layout predominantly vertical or horizontal?
